text:
Hello everyone. I have question about case

`Client error: POST <<https://api.hubapi.com/filemanager/api/v3/files/upload>> resulted in a 403 Forbidden response:\n{"status":"error","message":"HIGH_RISK_PORTAL","correlationId":"dadb8ebf-838a-4bf9-8ace-7b9c3ffa346f"}`

Please contact me!

Hi everyone! i want to ask if i integrate the HubSpot with a tool for call center as an example, they want permession to create,delete leads, so they can delete just leads created by them or all leads in general on HubSpot account ?
Hi <@U03HE9SAZLY>, they can delete all leads.
can i controll this ? to prevent deleting the data ? <@UCH1L597V>
currently there is no way to more granulate scopes, so if you are authorising it, i'm afraid you can't.
Can someone please link me to a public example of a Knowledge Base page built with "Service Hub Professional"?
thank you, very much appreciate it

hi! new here, please direct me if this is the wrong place to pose this question.

im looking to build an app, and am leaning to go the private app route. if i do, can the app be used across multiple HS workspaces as long as each one shares an API Key to access that instance?

for example,

• my workspace uses the app with my api key
• my friends workspace uses the app with his api key
etc!

would love any thoughts or help!
